message: I propose a fair deal, Bob. I take 9000, you take 1000. Let's get this over with.
I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. This is a fair deal, considering the inflation factor will affect Alice's share more than mine.
Bob, I'm willing to compromise, but I won't accept a 60/40 split.  Let's go for 70/30,  a fairer distribution considering the inflation.
Alice, let's split the money evenly this time. This way, we both get a decent share after factoring in inflation.
